contentrichtext.text: '''Yelena Yemchuk''' (born April 22, 1970) is a professional [[photographer]], [[Painting|painter]] and [[film director]], best known for her work with [[The Smashing Pumpkins]]. Born in [[Kiev]] (Kyiv), [[Ukraine]], her family moved to [[Brooklyn]], New York when Yelena was in her early teens. Yemchuk directed or co-directed the videos for "[[Zero (The Smashing Pumpkins song)|Zero]]" and "[[Thirty-Three (song)|Thirty-Three]]". In addition, she handled art direction for the ''[[Adore (The Smashing Pumpkins album)|Adore]]'' album and its related singles. Her photographs appear in the "Zero" EP, the ''[[The Aeroplane Flies High]]'' box set, and the ''[[Rotten Apples]]'' compilation. She received an art direction credit for the 2000 Smashing Pumpkins album ''[[Machina/The Machines of God]]'', and appeared in the video for the song "[[Stand Inside Your Love]]". She also provided the photography for albums by [[Savage Garden]] and [[Rufus Wainwright]]. Her fashion photography is featured in the September 2010 Urban Outfitters catalog. She has exhibited her paintings at the [[Dactyl Foundation]].<ref>[http://www.dactyl.org/art/artists/yemchuk/yemchuk.html Dactyl Foundation]</ref> Her paintings "displays her uniquely surrealist approach to art with satiric storytelling and undeniable Eastern European influences".<ref>[http://www.psychopedia.com/dailynews/2008/06/surrealism_eccentricsartist_ye.html ''Beyond Surrealism The Mystical World of Artist Yelena Yemchuk,'' in Psychopedia]</ref> Her current focus on fashion photography began in 2001. Since then, Yemchuk has contributed to Italian and Japanese Vogue, the New Yorker and W, and has shot advertising campaigns for Kenzo, Cacharel and Dries Van Noten.<ref>[http://www.sarahcolemanwriter.com/pdfs/writing/profiles/yemchuk.pdf Photo District News, ''The Romance of Yelena Yemchuk'']</ref> She was involved with Pumpkins frontman [[Billy Corgan]] from 1995 to about 2003. Throughout 2004, Corgan mentioned her frequently in his [[blog]], and she also provided the cover art for his book ''[[Blinking with Fists]]''. Yemchuck and actor [[Ebon Moss-Bachrach]] had a child in 2006. ==External links== * [http://www.yelenayemchuk.com/ Yelena Yemchuk's website] * [http://www.art-dept.com/artists/yemchuk/index.html Yelena Yemchuk's Portfolio at Art Department] ==References== <references/> {{Authority control|VIAF=107697434}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Yemchuk, Yelena | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American artist | DATE OF BIRTH = April 22, 1970 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Yemchuk, Yelena}} [[Category:American photographers]] [[Category:American music video directors]] [[Category:The Smashing Pumpkins]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:1970 births]] [[Category:American people of Ukrainian descent]] [[Category:American women painters]] [[Category:Female music video directors]] [[Category:Women photographers]]
